meanings.definition: The act of waking from sleep.
meanings.sent1: His wakenings in the morning are always peaceful.
meanings.sent2: The wakenings of the birds signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent3: The wakenings of the alarm clock are never welcomed.
meanings.sent4: The wakenings of nature after winter are a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The wakenings of the city can be heard at dawn.

meanings.definition: A revival of interest or attention.
meanings.sent1: The movie's wakenings brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent2: The wakenings of the old book led to a renewed passion for reading.
meanings.sent3: The wakenings of the audience during the performance were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The wakenings of the town's history fascinated the visitors.
meanings.sent5: The wakenings of curiosity in the students sparked engaging discussions.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming aware or conscious.
meanings.sent1: Her wakenings to the truth were gradual but profound.
meanings.sent2: The wakenings of society to the issue led to positive change.
meanings.sent3: The wakenings of the characters in the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent4: The wakenings of understanding in the students were rewarding to see.
meanings.sent5: The wakenings of empathy in him changed his perspective.
